hadiths.arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى...
hadiths.translation: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Actions are judged by intentions, and everyone will be rewarded according to what they intended.'

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ...
hadiths.translation: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: 'Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent.'

hadiths.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي خَطِيئَتِي وَجَهْلِي وَإِسْرَافِي فِي أَمْرِي...
hadiths.translation: O Allah, forgive my mistakes, my ignorance, and my excesses in my affairs...
The best among you are those who have the best character.

hadiths.arabic: إِذَا مَرِضَ الْعَبْدُ أَوْ سَافَرَ كُتِبَ لَهُ مَا كَانَ يَعْمَلُ صَحِيحًا مُقِيمًا...
hadiths.translation: When a servant of Allah becomes ill or travels, he is rewarded for the deeds he would normally perform while healthy or at home.

hadiths.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لِأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ...
hadiths.translation: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.

hadiths.arabic: إِنَّ الرِّزْقَ لَيَطْلُبُ الْعَبْدَ أَكْثَرَ مِمَّا يَطْلُبُهُ أَجَلُهُ...
hadiths.translation: Indeed, sustenance seeks a servant more than his appointed time of death does.
Indeed, Allah is beautiful and He loves beauty.

hadiths.arabic: اتَّقُوا الظُّلْمَ فَإِنَّ الظُّلْمَ ظُلُمَاتٌ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ...
hadiths.translation: Beware of oppression, for oppression will be darkness on the Day of Judgment.
The Merciful are shown mercy by The Merciful. Be merciful on the earth, and you will be shown mercy from above.
The best of people are those who are most beneficial to people.
The hand of Allah is with the group.

hadiths.arabic: مَنْ دَلَّ عَلَى خَيْرٍ فَلَهُ مِثْلُ أَجْرِ فَاعِلِهِ...
hadiths.translation: Whoever guides someone to goodness will have a reward like one who does it.
Abusing a Muslim is evil, and fighting him is disbelief.

hadiths.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ إِذَا عَمِلَ أَحَدُكُمْ عَمَلًا أَنْ يُتْقِنَهُ...
hadiths.translation: Indeed, Allah loves that when one of you does a job, he perfects it.

ayats.text: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌ ۖ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ ۖ فَلْيَسْتَجِيبُوا لِي وَلْيُؤْمِنُوا بِي لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْشُدُونَ
ayats.translation: And when My servants ask you, [O Muhammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me. So let them respond to Me [by obedience] and believe in Me that they may be [rightly] guided.

ayats.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
ayats.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.

ayats.text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوْمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُوا مَا بِأَنفُسِهِمْ
ayats.translation: Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves.

ayats.text: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
ayats.translation: And We have certainly made the Quran easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
And My Mercy encompasses all things.

ayats.text: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
ayats.translation: And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
For indeed, with hardship will be ease.
Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayats.text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا
ayats.translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure.
Indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
And my success is not but through Allah.
And do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
And I entrust my affair to Allah.

ayats.text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَظْلِمُ النَّاسَ شَيْئًا
ayats.translation: Indeed, Allah does not wrong the people at all.

ayats.text: وَعَسَىٰ أَن تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
ayats.translation: And perhaps you hate a thing and it is good for you.
And He is with you wherever you are.
Do not grieve; indeed, Allah is with us.
And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.

ayats.text: وَمَنْ يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
ayats.translation: And whoever relies upon Allah – then He is sufficient for him.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
And to Allah will [all] matters be returned.
Indeed, He is ever Seeing of His servants.
And seek help through patience and prayer.
Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive.
Indeed, Allah loves those who repent.

Footer.footerdesc: Global Salah is a website dedicated to providing accurate and convenient Islamic prayer time information to Muslims around the world.

calender.title: Islamic Calender
calender.desc: Islamic Calender Know Your Gregorian Date with Islamic Date

duas.title: Duas
duas.desc: Quranic Duas in Arabic with Translation

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Ablution
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismillaahi
duasTranslation.translation: In The Name Of Allah

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After The Completion Of Ablution
duasTranslation.arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu wa 'ash-hadu 'anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa Rasooluhu.
duasTranslation.translation: I Bear Witness That None Has The Right To Be Worshipped Except Allah, Alone Without Partner, And I Bear Witness That Muhammad Is His Slave And Messenger.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Eating
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismillaahi
duasTranslation.translation: In The Name Of Allah

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Eating
duasTranslation.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee at'amanaa wa saqaanaa wa ja'alanaa Muslimeen.
duasTranslation.translation: All praise is due to Allah Who has fed us, given us drink, and made us Muslims.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Sleeping
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amootu wa ahyaa.
duasTranslation.translation: In Your Name, O Allah, I die and I live.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Waking Up
duasTranslation.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee ahyaanaa ba'da maa amaatanaa wa ilayhin-nushoor.
duasTranslation.translation: All praise is due to Allah, Who has given us life after He has caused us to die, and to Him is the return.

duasTranslation.title: Morning Azkar
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna wa bika nahya wa bika namootu wa ilaykan-nushoor.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

duasTranslation.title: Evening Azkar
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna wa bika nahya wa bika namootu wa ilaykal-maseer.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is our return.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Entering The Bathroom
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal khubthi wal khabaa'ith.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the male and female devils.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Exiting The Bathroom
duasTranslation.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Ghufraanaka.
duasTranslation.translation: I seek Your forgiveness.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Starting A Journey
duasTranslation.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Subhaanal-lathee sakhkhara lanaa haathaa wamaa kunnaa lahu muqrineen wa inna ilaa rabbinaa lamunqaliboon.
duasTranslation.translation: Glory is to Him Who has subjected this to us, and we could not have otherwise subdued it. And indeed, to our Lord we will return.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr During A Journey
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَىٰ وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَىٰ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma innaa nas’aluka fi safarina haatha al-birra wat-taqwa wa minal ‘amali ma tardhaa.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, we ask You during this journey for righteousness and piety and for actions that please You.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Returning Home From A Journey
duasTranslation.arabic: آيِبُونَ تَائِبُونَ عَابِدُونَ لِرَبِّنَا حَامِدُونَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Aayiboona taa’iboona ‘aabidoona lirabbinaa haamidoon.
duasTranslation.translation: We return repenting, worshiping, and praising our Lord.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Entering The Market
duasTranslation.arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ، وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ، بِيَدِهِ الْخَيْرُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duasTranslation.transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, lahu al-mulku wa lahu al-hamdu, yuhyi wa yumiitu, wa huwa hayyun la yamootu, biyadihi al-khayru, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer.
duasTranslation.translation: There is no god but Allah, alone without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and to Him belongs all praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is Ever-Living and does not die. In His hand is all good, and He has power over everything.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Dressing
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا هُوَ لَهُ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا هُوَ لَهُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min khayrihi wa khayri ma huwa lahu wa a'udhu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma huwa lahu.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the goodness of this (garment) and the good it was made for, and I seek refuge with You from its evil and the evil it was made for.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Undressing
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismillaahi
duasTranslation.translation: In The Name Of Allah

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Leaving Home
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismillahi, tawakkaltu 'alallahi, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
duasTranslation.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no power and no strength except with Allah.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Entering Home
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلَجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayr al-mawlaji wa khayr al-makhraj.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the best entry and the best exit.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Entering The Mosque
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma iftah li abwaba rahmatik.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr Before Exiting The Mosque
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadhlik.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Prayer
duasTranslation.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Astaghfirullah, Astaghfirullah, Astaghfirullah.
duasTranslation.translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah. I seek forgiveness from Allah. I seek forgiveness from Allah.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Entering The Mosque
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma iftah lee abwaaba rahmatika.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Leaving The Mosque
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadhlika.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Sneezing
duasTranslation.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Alhamdulillah.
duasTranslation.translation: All praise is due to Allah.

duasTranslation.title: Response To Someone Who Sneezed
duasTranslation.arabic: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Yarhamuk Allah.
duasTranslation.translation: May Allah have mercy on you.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Breaking The Fast
duasTranslation.arabic: ذَهَبَ الظَّمَأُ، وَابْتَلَّتِ الْعُرُوقُ، وَثَبَتَ الأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Dhahaba adh-dhama'u wabtallatil-urooqu wa thabata al-ajru insha'Allah.
duasTranslation.translation: The thirst has gone, the veins are moist, and the reward is assured, if Allah wills.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Entering Home
duasTranslation.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duasTranslation.transliteration: Bismillah walajna wa bismillah kharajna wa 'ala Allahi rabbina tawakkalna.
duasTranslation.translation: In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

duasTranslation.title: Dhikr After Wearing A New Garment
duasTranslation.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
duasTranslation.transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtaneehi, as’aluka min khayrihi wa khayri ma suni'a lahu, wa a'oodhu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lahu.
duasTranslation.translation: O Allah, all praise is for You. You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its good and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil for which it was made.

aboutus.title: About us
aboutus.desc: Global Salah was founded by a Muslim and dedicated team which provides accurate Islamic information to their customers. Our team has experts, Alims, Muftees, and Quran Hafiz, who work together devotedly to deliver reliable information.
aboutus.missionparagraph: At Global Salah, our mission is to guide Muslims in Islamic essentials. We help Muslims honestly to connect with religious instructions, no matter where they are in the world.  Our website is authentic and easy to use.
aboutus.coredesc: We are guided by authenticity, reliability, respect and revolutions. Our website aims to provide more organized and trustworthy information such as qibla direction, namaz prayer and other essentials. We sincerely respect the diversity of Muslims globally and try to develop innovations gradually.
aboutus.visiondesc: Global Salah will likely provide you with more enhanced and updated Islamic information. We will stay more focused on Islamic teachings and deliver good deeds practice with proper references.
aboutus.mentalclaritydesc: Helps in reducing stress and anxiety
aboutus.disciplinedesc: Builds self-control and time management skills
aboutus.dailystructuredesc: Provides a beneficial routine to your day
aboutus.prayertimesdesc: Accurate prayer times for your location
aboutus.islamiccalenderdesc: Know your hijri date according to the gregorian date

countrieslist.title: Country
countrieslist.desc: Discover accurate prayer timings for countries worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: Get in touch with Global Salah. We're here to answer your questions and listen to your feedback.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtext_1: Please read these terms carefully before using our service
terms.subparagraph_1: You are warmly welcome at Global Salah! By accessing our international service, you must agree to terms and conditions that make a respectful community. You can use the Global Salah service with responsibility only to get the Islamic information that is consent to some applicable laws, rules and guidelines.
terms.subparagraph_2: Accessible customers are responsible for maintaining privacy; we allow you to share your thoughts, so you have to post relevant content in a respected way. Because users are responsible for the content they share on their profile. Global Salah has the right to eliminate your access if needed! If changes are made in the terms and conditions policy. We will update you thoroughly.
terms.subheading_3: Where Will These Terms and Conditions Be Used?
terms.subparagraph_3: These terms and conditions mentioned above will apply to all Global Salah users. They have to follow it respectively. You can use our services easily on any device, regardless of your data or location. Customers have to read these terms and conditions carefully.
terms.subparagraph_4: Our privacy policy is relatively standard and straightforward, but Global Salah never shares, rents, or sells its customers' information and profiles.
terms.subparagraph_5: Welcome to Global Salah! Our website provides accurate updates regarding Islamic prayer time, Ahadith, Ayat,Duas, and other Islamic information. We helped many Muslims globally to stay connected with their Islamic practices on time. You can smoothly access our Global Salah update from anywhere.
terms.footertext: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subparagraph_1: You have to share your information directly with us. The information we gathered from you through customer query forms. Our purpose behind taking your information is to make your experience with us finer and flawless.
privacy.subparagraph_2: The information you share is only used to maintain and improve service quality and enhance your experience. Our website assures you that you can complete your needs regarding Islamic information or prayer requests. Stay connected so we can easily cater to your needs.
privacy.subparagraph_3: Your privacy is our priority. We ensure all your information is in safe hands. Our website never allows access to anyone. Here, your information is protected by strict laws and legal policies. No one can approach each other's data.
privacy.subparagraph_4: All your information remains confidential and secure. We save your data by following monitored devices and protocols. When we are about to revise any data, you will be notified with notice
privacy.subparagraph_5: Our website allows their customers to make changes to the data anytime. They can share, edit, and delete the information given. You have complete access to control your profile. However, customers are being guided by promotional communications and guidelines.
privacy.subparagraph_6: We change our policies occasionally. You will be updated and get revised policy instructions if any changes are made. Transitions are essential for websites to work smoothly
privacy.subparagraph_7: If you have queries regarding anything, we are here to answer you. You can contact us by email at support@globalsalah.com.

country.title: Prayer Times For Cities in
country.subparagraph_1: Explore rich history, diverse culture, and stunning landscapes. From bustling cities to peaceful escapes, there’s something for everyone. Enjoy local flavors, uncover hidden gems, and create unforgettable memories. Adventure, relaxation, and culture await!
country.subparagraph_2: Experience a blend of rich traditions, vibrant heritage, and warm hospitality. From historic landmarks to modern wonders, every corner tells a story. Indulge in local flavors, explore artistic expressions, and immerse yourself in the unique charm of the destination.
country.subparagraph_3: Discover breathtaking landscapes, diverse ecosystems, and abundant wildlife. From lush forests to serene coastlines, nature thrives in every corner. Explore scenic trails, encounter unique species, and experience the beauty of the natural world.
country.subparagraph_4: A hub of innovation, opportunity, and progress. With a dynamic business landscape and a strong economic foundation, growth and development are ever-present. From emerging industries to global trade, the future is built on ambition and resilience.
country.subparagraph_5: Embrace a relaxed pace where simplicity and balance define everyday life. From scenic surroundings to a strong sense of community, enjoy a stress-free atmosphere that encourages leisure, connection, and well-being.

thankyou.heading: We Appreciate Your Message
thankyou.paragraph: We appreciate you contacting Global Salah. Your message is important to us, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. In the meantime, explore accurate prayer times, the Islamic calender, and helpful resources to stay connected with your faith. JazakAllah Khair!
thankyou.sub-paragraph: Feel free to send us an email and we'll respond as quickly as possible.

makkahtv.mainparagraph: Experience a spiritual journey with live broadcasts from the Holy Mosque—watch in real-time and feel connected.
makkahtv.subparagraph: This 24/7 live stream provides viewers worldwide with a connection to the Holy Mosque in Makkah.Experience the spiritual atmosphere of Islam's holiest site, witness the Tawaf around the Kaaba, and join in prayer from anywhere in the world.
makkahtv.footertext: This stream is provided for educational and spiritual purposes.

madinatv.mainparagraph: Experience a spiritual journey with live broadcasts from the Prophet's Mosque—watch in real-time and feel connected.
madinatv.subparagraph: This 24/7 live stream connects viewers worldwide to the Prophet’s Mosque in Madinah. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere of Islam’s second holiest site, witness the prayers, and experience the spiritual tranquility from anywhere in the world.
madinatv.footertext: This stream is offered for learning and spiritual enrichment.

ramadanpage.heading: Ramadan Calender 2025
ramadanpage.footertext: Suhoor ends at Fajr time • Iftar begins at Maghrib time

namesofallah.heading: The 99 Names of Allah
namesofallah.paragraph: Asma ul-Husna - The Beautiful Names of Allah with Meanings and Pronunciation
namesofallah.subparagraph: The 99 Names of Allah, or Asma'ul Husna, reflect His mercy, wisdom, and greatness. Each name carries a special meaning, guiding believers toward faith and inner peace.
